summary.para: Gets a font given its zero-based index.

param.name: index
param.para: Zero-based index of the font in the font list.

param.name: font
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the newly created object.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the font collection that contains the fonts in the font list.

param.name: fontCollection
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the current object.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the number of fonts in the font list.

returns.para: The number of fonts in the font list.
